ygData.subject: RE: Evil eyes
ygData.msgSnippet: correct sianne  you can not cast  at all
ygData.messageBody:
correct sianne you can not cast at all


>From: "Sianne ." <maggee1@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Evil eyes
>Date: Tue, 05 Oct 1999 20:44:02 GMT
>
>I am confused i spose cuz i have never been charmed, as of yet....how can
>you cancel magic if you are charmed? you can't cast ...correct???
>
>Sianne
>Xegony
>
>
>>From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
>>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>>To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Evil eyes
>>Date: Tue, 5 Oct 1999 14:39:46 -0500
>>
>> > From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>> >
>> > I have spent the last two days fighting evil eyes in
>> > the gorge. However, there are still a couple things
>> > that puzzle me. I was really hoping someone could
>> > enlighten me. :)
>> >
>> > 1) Charm, does cancel magic work on it or not? I have
>> > tried casting several times with mixed results.
>> > Sometimes it seems to cancel it sometimes it does not.
>> > All of my party members had only endure magic on, so
>> > the second dispel should have theoretically worked,
>> > but sometimes it did not. What gives?
>>
>>Hmm, I always thought that Cancel Magic removed charm, but have not had to
>>use it in quite some time so I cannot verify this.
>>
>>
>> > 2) When charmed, I thought you could not use your
>> > skills/spells. This seemed to be the case until late
>> > last night when a 28th cater was charmed and then
>> > proceeded to kill me in three casts. I also lost about
>> > a half a bubble of exp from this PC death. I later
>> > asked the caster and she said that she was killed me
>> > by a spell that was memorized in the 6th slot, not the
>> > 8th slot like some people think. Her 8th slot was a
>> > gate.
>>
>>*YOU* cannot cast while charmed, but the NPC that charmed you can use your
>>complete arsenal against whatever you are fighting, this includes any of
>>the
>>8 spells you have memorized.
>>
>>
>> > So, what gives?? I think correct information would
>> > come in handy in later levels.
>> >
>> > Thanks!!!
>> >
>> > Eylena 20th circle Priestess of Tunare.
>>
>>
>>
>>
>>Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
>>Solusek Ro
>>
>>
>>
>>
>>

><< text3.html >>
